4. I discussed some of these aspects in my @thedailybeast article out this AM https://t.co/NI8toJ0ths

3. We must help India accelerate supply chains for their major vaccine manufacturers, and recognize a domino effect as India now wont export vaccine to Africa, we need a coherent overarching foreign policy for vaccine diplomacy. So far not articulated from WH or State Dept
2. Well need to vaccinate Canada and northern Mexico to also halt virus transmission in the US. This means more than sending a few million AZOx doses

1. The conservative lobby and four polls now showing that 40-50% of Republicans wont get vaccinated. We must expand our outreach to conservative groups. Remember its not 70% of adults we must reach, its 70% of total population, and that means almost all adults

Many thanks @AlisynCamerota @VictorBlackwell for hosting me following @POTUS remarks important to optimize access for those who want to get vaccinated. I was enthusiastic about his comments, but also there were a few elements missing, here they are: https://t.co/OuOCx5k19S
RT @CCDHate: "A report from the CCDH found that just 12 anti-vaxxers are responsible for almost two-thirds of anti-vaccine content circulat

Looking at the just released fact sheet: @POTUS doing everything possible to ensure that anyone who wants to get vaccinated can. And thats great, and important, but not sufficient for reaching conservatives who are dug in, we must help them too https://t.co/SkzViYUDv9
Looks forward to speaking with @AlisynCamerota @VictorBlackwell on @CNN 3 PM Eastern, 2 PM Central

Whenever someone starts a conversation, Im not antivaccine but... remember the guy who told you its not about the money because it will be all about the money. Fox News night programming has launched a very destructive antivaccine campaign in 2021. I dont understand why https://t.co/W5DVlwbeG5

Its impressive how so many false statements can be packed into a single tweet, but will focus on the first: I take Zero Big PhRMA funding, grants, contracts, personal funding or otherwise. 4/4 I discuss some of these aspects in my new @thedailybeast article this AM https://t.co/NI8toJ0ths

3/4 In the US Im concerned about a widening disparity across different states. The blue or blueish states in New England, NY, CA, NM now with 50% vaccine coverage, but deep red states GA AL TN LA ID WY under 35% we need greater outreach to conservative groups

2/4 globally US needs to shape a more coherent foreign policy and vaccine diplomacy framework, balancing the needs to support COVAX, India and the need to help vaccinate Canada and Mexico to slow virus transmission across North America, also our @TexasChildrens vaccine

RT @TCRG2012: @PeterHotez https://t.co/wxXC64zXKs

In my writings and public remarks, Ive been working to make the case that antiscience and some antivaccine belong in the same category as other disinformation and hate groups. So far, I dont have all the dots connected, but its awfully close.

Its a fair point, but I do this after some discussion thought. A reason I remain on Twitter: to reflect and educate on how antiscience disinformation operates: the players, their methods, their increasing sophistication, links with other hate groups, some find it instructive. https://t.co/OO6yAatfq7
RT @TheCaroleShow: I am so thankful for @PeterHotez.

Important question. And the answer is...I have no clue. Like everyone else, I have hypotheses and speculations, some boring and dreary around ratings (most likely) others more provocative around international intrigue (but less likely). We just dont know https://t.co/PeYgXUVuHT
So its clear there is a direct line from antivax ringleaders to Fox News producers, mutually benefiting both parties

They said HPV vaccine causes infertility and miscarriages and now copy paste that onto COVID19 vaccines. Remember whats happening. Antivax forces are getting ready to draw a line in the sand against any approvals for adolescents 12-15 years old

So heres the actual deal: as we worked to discredit fake antivaccine links to autism and with some success with my Rachel book, the antivaccine lobby needed a new thing. So they went after the HPV vaccine and made the same fake assertions about its links to reproductive health

Wow, right out of the antivaccine playbook, except more nuanced fine tuned. Diabolical: Fox News has recruited clever writers, with science backgrounds, to press their political agenda, discredit scientists, promote doubt and instability. The Murdochs pay better wages than Putin https://t.co/W5DVlwbeG5
